br.ufu.facom.minas.core

Class MINASConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufu.facom.minas.core.MINASConfiguration

  • public class MINASConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps all the MINAS' parameters required in the MINAS.process(DataInstance, MINASModel, MINASConfiguration) method.
    Since:
    1.0
